V nesreči pri Obrovu izgubil življenje 21-letni voznik
07 Nov 2019, 09:33 by Danijel Cek

Pri vasi Obrov se je malo po 7. uri zgodila huda prometna nesreča, v kateri je umrl mlad voznik, 21-letni domačin iz Račic.



21-letnika so najprej oživljali gasilci, nato še reševalci, a mu žal ni bilo več pomoči. Foto: Danijel Cek

OBROV > 21-letnik se je zjutraj vozil iz Račic v službo v Trst, ko ga je na mokri cesti v izteku desnega ovinka tik pred vasjo Obrov zaneslo v levo in je silovito trčil v nasproti vozeči tovornjak. 43-letni voznik tovornjaka se zaradi brežine ob cesti ni imel kam umakniti.
Na kraj so prvi prihiteli gasilci PGD Materija, takoj za njimi še gasilci PGD Ilirska Bistrica, ki so se ravno vračali z druge prometne nesreče. 21-letnika so izvlekli iz avta in ga do prihoda reševalcev deset minut izmenično oživljali z masažo srca.
Še pred poslanimi reševalci iz Hrpelj so na kraj prišli reševalci iz Ilirske Bistrice, ki so slučajno peljali dva bolnika v izolsko bolnišnico, nakar so prišli tudi sežanski reševalci z zdravnico. Še pol ure so se trudili z mladeničem, a mu žal ni bilo več pomoči.
Druga nesreča v dveh urah, četrta od nedelje
Dve uri pred tem, ob 5.11 se je na tej cesti, na nevarnem odseku pri Račicah, zgodila še ena huda nesreča, v kateri sta bili udeleženi osebno in tovorno vozilo. Ena oseba je bila poškodovana. Posredovali so gasilci iz Ilirske Bistrice in Podgrada, ki so s tehničnim posegom rešili poškodovano osebo iz vozila. Nudili so ji prvo pomoč z reševalci NMP Ilirska Bistrica ter postavili prevrnjen avto na kolesa. Poškodovano osebo so prepeljali v izolsko bolnišnico.
Še en voznik je v istem nevarnem ovinku nad Račicami zdrsnil z vozišča v torek, v nedeljo popoldne pa je med drevesi in grmovjem pod tem ovinkom pristal tudi mlad hrvaški voznik.



V izteku ovinka je voznika zaneslo naravnost pod tovornjak. Foto: Danijel Cek

A 21-year-old driver lost his life in an accident at Obrov
07 Nov 2019, 09:33 by Danijel Cek

Shortly after 7am, a serious car accident happened in the village of Obrov, in which a young driver, a 21-year-old native of Racic, died.



The 21-year-old was first resuscitated by firefighters and then by paramedics, but unfortunately he was no longer helped. Photo: Daniel Cek

OBROV> A 21-year-old man was driving from Račice to work in Trieste in the morning when, on a wet road, at the end of a right turn, he was driven to the left by the village of Obrov and collided violently in a moving truck. The 43-year-old truck driver had nowhere to retreat due to a bank on the side of the road.
PGD Materi firefighters came first, followed by PGD Ilirska Bistrica firefighters, who were just returning from another car accident. The 21-year-old was pulled out of the car and was resuscitated with a heart massage until ten minutes before the ambulance arrived.
Rescuers from Ilirska Bistrica, who accidentally took two patients to the hospital in Izola, arrived at the place before Hrpelj's ambulances were sent, and then rescuers from Sežana with a doctor arrived. They continued to work with the young man for half an hour, but unfortunately he was no longer helped.
Second accident in two hours, fourth since Sunday
Two hours earlier, at 5.11, another serious accident involving a car and a truck took place on this road, on a dangerous section near Rače. One person was injured. Firefighters from Ilirska Bistrica and Podgrad intervened to rescue the injured person from the vehicle by technical intervention. They offered her first aid with NMP Ilirska Bistrica rescuers and put the overturned car on wheels. The injured person was transported to hospital in Izola.
Another driver slid off the roadway in the same dangerous bend over Racice on Tuesday, and a young Croatian driver landed between the trees and bushes under that bend on Sunday afternoon.
